name: 陳昶瑞
objective:
本課程主要教導學生對結構分析有深入之認識並透過實際演練使其具解析建築結構行為之能力主要授課內容如下：
１．結構之應力分析之理論與假定。
２．構材應力分析及設計方法。
３．利用彈性曲線法，共軛梁法，虛功法等計算靜定梁之彈性變形。
４．利用虛功法計算桁架及剛構架之彈性變形。
５．靜不定結構之分析法含諧合變位法，最小功法，斜坡撓度法，力矩分配法。
６．構架之極限載重計算，含增量載重法，破壞機構法，虛功法。
schedule:
Week 01: Course Introduction
Week 02: Suspension Footbridges
Week 03: Suspended Roof
Week 04: Concrete Cylindrical Shell Roof
Week 05: Trussed Roof
Week 06: Building on Vertical Site
Week 07: Multipanel and Efficient Trusses
Week 08: Fanlike Roof
Week 09: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Unreinforced Masonry
Week 11: Restraints for Funicular Structures
Week 12: Shell and Membrane Structures
Week 13: Structural Materials
Week 14: Bay of Framing
Week 15: Columns, Frames, and Load Bearing Walls
Week 16: Sitecast and Precast Concrete Building
Week 17: Entrance Canopy
Week 18: Final Exam
materials: Allen, E. and Zalewski, W. (2009). Form and Forces: Designing Efficient, Expressive Structures, 1st Edition. John Wiley & Sons, Inc., Hoboken, New Jersey.
